name: 13 Cycles
description:
As a survivor of this ephemeral shattered world you will grow in knowledge and power each time you are reborn.

Featuring the rogue-lite action spirit, terraforming of a procedurally generated square planet and extensive spell crafting at its heart, 13 Cycles also gives you extreme freedom of weapon control and platforming motion up to being able to run around floating islands. The world is up to you to discover and experiment with.

Will you consume? Will you harvest? How far will you go in your search for wisdom?Key features:Rogue-lite progression.
Randomly generated planetary worlds.
Highly customizable ability crafting.
Variable foes that mirror your ability.
Freedom of platforming and weapon motion.
